item.title: Building a Sketchy Website 101
item.description: Back in April, I won a free “.club” domain through gandi.net’s anniversary prize giveaway. I really didn’t need a “.club” domain in particular, so I thought it would be pretty fun to register a stereotypical “sketchy” domain and set it up as a drive-by download site or something, because while I’ve heard of doing this kind of thing, I’ve never actually done it before. Here’s a blog post walking through what I did.
